items.name: Spider's leg
items.description: A spider's leg, torn from a fully grown adult spider. Something about it still makes you feel uneasy...

items.name: Skeleton's bone
items.description: A Skeletons bone, fallen off from a skeleton. Something about it still makes you feel uneasy...

items.name: Centaur Heart
items.description: A Centaur Heart, torn right out of a Centaur brimming with vitality.

items.name: Pom Of Power
items.description: A Pom Of Power, picked off of the tree of life. Capable of strengthening the power of the gods.

items.name: Hero's Urn's
items.description: A Hero's Urn, earned as a reward for defeating them. Something about it still makes you feel uneasy...
